normalizationRules.name: Trim Section Spaces
normalizationRules.description: Trim leading and trailing spaces for all parts of the qualified name

normalizationRules.name: Remove Hostname Spaces
normalizationRules.description: Remove all spaces from the hostname

normalizationRules.name: Remove Square Brackets
normalizationRules.description: Remove square brackets from the path and encode the space between the square brackets.

normalizationRules.name: Lowercase File Extension
normalizationRules.description: Lowercase the file extension, if present.

normalizationRules.name: Lowercase scheme
normalizationRules.description: Lower case the scheme (http, https, s3, etc)

normalizationRules.name: Remove double slash
normalizationRules.description: Removes double slashes that are not following a colon

normalizationRules.name: Lower case ADF Data
normalizationRules.description: Lowercases the subscription name, resource group name, provider name, factory name, pipeline name, and activity name.

normalizationRules.name: Convert ADLSGen1 to adl scheme
normalizationRules.description: If an ADLSGen1 asset is using http or https, convert the scheme to adl://.

normalizationRules.name: Remove Trailing Slash
normalizationRules.description: Remove the trailing slash from higher level assets for Azure Blob, ADLS Gen1,and ADLS Gen2
